pr_title: CorfuStore: Record if table is opened as disk based

timeline.message:
CorfuStore: Record if table is opened as disk based

This is needed for the checkpointer to make sure that
a disk based table is opened as a disk based table and
not an in-memory table.

CorfuStore: Record if table is opened as disk based

This is needed for the checkpointer to make sure that
a disk based table is opened as a disk based table and
not an in-memory table.
CorfuStore: Add test to checkpoint & Trim disk based CorfuStore table
CorfuBrowser: Add support for disk tables

timeline.bodyText: I know you are just using the provided API, but we really need to clean this interface. Creating a disk back CorfuTable should be as easy as creating an in-memory table.
timeline.author: Maithem

replies.bodyText: I completely agree. The api is super messy right now.
replies.author: hisundar

If a table is too large to fit in memory then user can
pass a --diskPath and let that table be opened
as an in-memory table.
